languages.text: "Мы скорбим, что вызвали твой гнев, Домин. И надеемся, что однажды ты поймешь — в служении нашем нет греха перед Ним и перед экипажем сего корабля".
"We lament having incurred your anger, Domin. And we hope that you may yet understand: there is no fault in our service — before Him, or before the crew of this vessel."
languages.original_text: "Мы скорбим, что вызвали твой гнев, Домин. И надеемся, что однажды ты поймешь — в служении нашем нет греха перед Ним и перед экипажем сего корабля".

traits.locale_text: "We lament having incurred your anger, Domin. And we hope that you may yet understand: there is no fault in our service — before Him, or before the crew of this vessel."
"We lament having incurred your anger, Domin. And we hope that you may yet understand: there is no fault in our service — before Him, or before the crew of this vessel."
"We lament having incurred your anger, Domin. And we hope that you may yet understand: there is no fault in our service — before Him, or before the crew of this vessel."

"We lament having incurred your anger, Domin. And we hope that you may yet understand: there is no fault in our service — before Him, or before the crew of this vessel."
"We lament having incurred your anger, Domin. And we hope that you may yet understand: there is no fault in our service — before Him, or before the crew of this vessel."

languages.text: «Lamentamos haber provocado su ira, Domin. Esperamos que pueda entender que nuestro servicio es leal, tanto hacia Él como hacia la tripulación de esta nave».
languages.original_text: "We lament having incurred your anger, Domin. And we hope that you may yet understand: there is no fault in our service — before Him, or before the crew of this vessel."

traits.locale_text: «Lamentamos haber provocado su ira, Domin. Esperamos que pueda entender que nuestro servicio es leal, tanto hacia Él como hacia la tripulación de esta nave».

languages.text: 「ドミン、あなたの怒りを買ったことを嘆きます。あなたがきっと理解してくれるだろうと、思っています。主の前でも、この船の乗組員の前でも、私たちの奉仕に落ち度はありません」
languages.original_text: "We lament having incurred your anger, Domin. And we hope that you may yet understand: there is no fault in our service — before Him, or before the crew of this vessel."

traits.locale_text: 「ドミン、あなたの怒りを買ったことを嘆きます。あなたがきっと理解してくれるだろうと、思っています。主の前でも、この船の乗組員の前でも、私たちの奉仕に落ち度はありません」

languages.text: “我们很抱歉招致了您的怒火，秘者。我们希望您能理解，我们的侍奉本身没有任何过错，无论是在不死神皇面前，还是在这艘船的船员面前。”
languages.original_text: "We lament having incurred your anger, Domin. And we hope that you may yet understand: there is no fault in our service — before Him, or before the crew of this vessel."

traits.locale_text: “我们很抱歉招致了您的怒火，秘者。我们希望您能理解，我们的侍奉本身没有任何过错，无论是在不死神皇面前，还是在这艘船的船员面前。”

languages.text: "Wir beklagen, dass wir Euren Ärger geweckt haben, Domin. Aber wir hoffen, dass Ihr irgendwann versteht, dass in unserem Dienst kein Fehl liegt – nicht vor ihm und nicht vor der Crew dieses Schiffs."
languages.original_text: "We lament having incurred your anger, Domin. And we hope that you may yet understand: there is no fault in our service — before Him, or before the crew of this vessel."

traits.locale_text: "Wir beklagen, dass wir Euren Ärger geweckt haben, Domin. Aber wir hoffen, dass Ihr irgendwann versteht, dass in unserem Dienst kein Fehl liegt – nicht vor ihm und nicht vor der Crew dieses Schiffs."

languages.text: « Nous sommes navrés de vous avoir {mf|mis|mise} en colère, Domin. Et nous espérons que vous ferez preuve de compréhension : jamais nous n'avons manqué à notre devoir, que ce soit devant Lui ou envers l'équipage de ce vaisseau. »
languages.original_text: "We lament having incurred your anger, Domin. And we hope that you may yet understand: there is no fault in our service — before Him, or before the crew of this vessel."

traits.locale_text: « Nous sommes navrés de vous avoir {mf|mis|mise} en colère, Domin. Et nous espérons que vous ferez preuve de compréhension : jamais nous n'avons manqué à notre devoir, que ce soit devant Lui ou envers l'équipage de ce vaisseau. »

languages.original_text: "We lament having incurred your anger, Domin. And we hope that you may yet understand: there is no fault in our service — before Him, or before the crew of this vessel."

languages.text: "Öfkelenmene sebep olduğumuz için üzgünüz Domin. Yine de umuyoruz ki ne Tanrı İmparator'un ne de bu geminin mürettebatının nezdinde hizmetimizde kusur olmadığını ileride anlarsın."
languages.original_text: "We lament having incurred your anger, Domin. And we hope that you may yet understand: there is no fault in our service — before Him, or before the crew of this vessel."
